reviewText:
Who ever came up with the idea of video recording girls naked at a beach, or any other location, sure was desperate for money. Ther are so many different kinds, each with their own quality, format, and way the videos were produced. By far, Girls Gone Wild is the best, but some aren't too bad either.

This is one of those videos that's not too bad, although I don't really recommend this video too much. Mainly because it's just people with cams going to general locations and filming the girls naked on site. There's clearly no direct form of real production, they are filmed and then put whatever they thought would be worth using on a DVD. The quality of the video is actually pretty good, so thumbs up on the video quality. This is clearly a low budget, low cost video production with very little direction on what they wanted to put on a DVD. A typical high school drop out could have made a similar video with just as much effort as this company has put into this. There's no introduction, no one hosting the videos, no form of editorial, just a lot of pointing the camera and filming. You may as well grab a camera and do this yourself if you plan to go to a topless party. If I had known it's that easy to market a DVD such as this, I would have done this a long time ago.

This is not a recommended video I would buy, but sadly I did buy it on the hopes that it would be fun to watch. I do agree with one of the other reviewers about how this is pretty much "Girls Gone Wild" rejects who didn't make it into the REAL "Girls Gone Wild". In short, not bad, but not recommended. Buy at your own risk.
I guess this is why it was so cheap.  These were the girls on spring break that couldn't make it on GGW.  They were enthusiastic tho.

I've seen quite a lot of these college-girl-public-flashing DVDs, and I'd say that WILD PARTY GIRLS: NAKED SPRING BREAK is one of the better ones of this genre. It's a typical format, with the Wild Party Girls crew visiting various beaches at Spring Break time. So of course there's lots of cute girls in and out of bikinis. LOTS of topless scenes here, and just a little full nudity. Nothing incredibly explicit, but several hot scenes of girls caressing, licking, and rubbing oil on each other. Many well-endowed ladies here too, for sure!! And the variety of settings is good - girls flashing in the streets, lying on the beach, at wet t-shirt contests, and so on. This DVD runs a typical 60 minutes, and has as a bonus a nice slide show of stills from the DVD that runs about 3 minutes. One reason I like this DVD a lot, aside from the sexy ladies of course, is the superior camerawork compared to other such DVDs. As, this has steadier than usual cameras, mostly great shots, good editing, and so on. There is one wet t-shirt contest that gets a little tedious and needed to be edited better, but that's an exception and overall this is very well done. And, there's NOT a lot of image manipulation here that bugs me on some shows like this - stuff like funky colors, split screen shots, rapid motion, and so on. As, the DVD Wild Party Girls: Naked Boat Bash is also a good DVD that's definitely worth getting, but it does have more annoying image manipulation than this one does. I also like some similar Crazy Chicks DVDs, such as Crazy Chicks: Key West and Crazy Chicks: Devil's Cove. Anyway, WILD PARTY GIRLS: NAKED SPRING BREAK is a keeper!!

Just like the title, it is better than girls gone wild. It's more real. Lots of hot girls and other nice elements!
